review.comment: Jeremiah was awesome to work with.  We had a gas leak and he was so prompt and helpful in getting the leak fixed and the gas turned back on.

review.comment: I chose Cooper Plumbing because they were located nearby, had numerous great reviews, and their website indicated that they were very familiar with tankless water heaters. A real person answered the phone (shock) and was able to schedule my appointment for the same day. Luckily, Travis was my assigned plumber. He was knowledgeable and patient as I explained my problem and was able to explain in layman’s terms the possible solutions. He started with the least expensive and it solved my problem. I can’t comment on how their prices rate with other companies but can only imagine less reputable companies/plumbers would have taken advantage of a senior female to do more than necessary to increase the expense. It’s refreshing to find a company like Cooper Plumbing and I will definitely be calling them for any future needs. If all their plumbers are as personable, qualified, and competent as Travis, I will feel confident in using them again.
review.review_reply: Hi Jo Susa - We appreciate the feedback. Reviews like these are why we go above and beyond to the best of our ability as the local plumber. Thank you!

review.comment: 1st time I’ve used this company. I made an appointment; they were very accommodating to my schedule. They showed up promptly, took their time to listen to my concerns, and fixed my issues quickly.  My bill was reasonable. I recommended them to my next-door neighbor, and will use them again

review.comment: I recently purchased a townhome and was worried about some potential plumbing issues. David came out and diagnosed the problem, and while he was here, he also took a look at several other things that were listed in the inspection report. Turned out I needed a new water heater (which was not a surprise). He gave us a competitive quote for replacing it, and a couple days later, he and DJ delivered and installed it. Their work was thorough and detailed, and they never hesitated to talk through and address any concerns that I had. Highly recommended.
review.review_reply: Hi Ryan Slinger - Our team at Cooper plumbing appreciates the review. We are grateful for the opportunity to be able to take care of your water heater and plumbing issues . Thank you!

review.comment: Travis of Cooper Plumbing came out to our house to replace a toilet flange. He was very professional and did the work quickly. I would not hesitate to contact Cooper Plumbing in the future.

review.comment: Great experience, from scheduling to the gentleman coming out to perform the work. Swapped from dual drain sink to a single, new faucet and new disposal installation. Very quick, well done. Price seemed high but you get what you pay for these days, so I still chose them and happy with the outcome.
review.review_reply: Hi Adam Arms  -  We see our technician David was able to get your garbage disposal, kitchen faucet and drains rerouted under the kitchen sink. Our team at Cooper Plumbing appreciates the review and feedback. Thank you!
Hi Vijay Reddy - We see Travis was out and performed a air pressure test on the home. The Cooper Plumbing team appreciates the review. Thank you!

review.comment: It turned out I only needed to replace the flapper on my toilet to fix my immediate problem – something I could easily do myself – but I didn’t know that at the time I called Cooper Plumbing. My ex has always handled home repairs, but now it’s on me to figure it out. Needless to say, online reviews were extremely important to me in deciding who to call. I called CP because of their overall excellent reviews. I was not disappointed – great response time, exceptional customer service, knowledge, professionalism – 5 stars all around… I was told upfront that a fee of $49 would be charged to assess the problem and then, if I wanted them to do that work, that fee would go toward the work. The plumber who made my service call, Scott Miller, quickly assessed the problem. He gave me a range of options from me installing a $7 flapper to him installing a new toilet. This toilet is 37 years old and DOES need to be replaced. I plan to renovate my bathrooms this year, so I obviously chose the cheapest option. But, since I was paying for Scott’s time on this service call, why not ask questions?? Scott showed me how to replace the flapper and then answered my oh so many questions on what was involved on the plumbing side of a bathroom renovation. He gave me ballpark estimates on costs, made suggestions on pipes, the best water-efficient toilets, etc. and gave me some great tips on working with a contractor. Many of my questions were pretty basic, but Scott made me feel comfortable in asking them. I was so impressed with his knowledge and professionalism. He was also a really nice person! And he didn’t make me feel stupid – I know I asked some pretty stupid questions! After talking with Scott, I feel more confident in talking to a contractor about my bathroom renovations and plan to use Cooper Plumbing as the licensed plumber for this job. I will be asking for Scott! If the other guys who work for CP are anything like Scott, you are in good hands. I have trust and confidence they will shoot straight with you, not try to up-sell nor take advantage of your “lack of plumbing knowledge.” I will absolutely be calling CP for my future plumbing needs and don’t hesitate to recommend them.
review.review_reply: Hi Debbie, thank you so much for the feedback! Cooper plumbing works hard to provide this type of experience for our clients and it’s good to hear about how we are doing. We are grateful to get the opportunity to be your go to Houston plumber.
Hi Jennifer Brasher - We see our plumber David was able to diagnose and find issue with city main line clog. We appreciate the review . Thank you!

review.comment: Travis was great. Our garbage disposal wasn’t working, and instead of trying to sell me a new one, he fixed our old one and saved me money. This is our new go-to plumber.
review.review_reply: Hi Carley Covert - Part of our mission at Cooper Plumbing is efficiency in the most cost effective way. We are happy to get the opportunity to be your go to plumber in Houston . Thank you!
